```{r}
library(tidyverse)

prizes_raw <- readr::read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-10-28/prizes.csv"
)
head(prizes_raw)
glimpse(prizes_raw)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)

prizes_clean <- prizes_raw |>
  distinct() |>
  mutate(across(where(is.character), str_trim)) |>
  filter(!is.na(prize_year)) |>
  mutate(
    prize_genre = as.factor(prize_genre),
    prize_institution = as.factor(prize_institution),
    person_role = as.factor(person_role),
    gender = as.factor(gender),
    ethnicity_macro = as.factor(ethnicity_macro)
  )

write_csv(prizes_clean, "~/Downloads/cleaned_prizes.csv")
prizes_clean
```
